content:
[build]
  command = "npm run build"
  publish = "dist"

{
  "name": "lawns-all-day",
  "type": "module",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "scripts": {
    "dev": "astro dev",
    "start": "astro dev",
    "build": "astro build",
    "build:check": "astro check && astro build",
    "preview": "astro preview",
    "astro": "astro",
    "generate": "node scripts/generate-pages.js"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "@astrojs/check": "^0.5.10",
    "@astrojs/react": "^4.3.0",
    "@astrojs/tailwind": "^5.1.0",
    "@radix-ui/react-dialog": "^1.1.14",
    "@radix-ui/react-slot": "^1.2.3",
    "@radix-ui/react-toast": "^1.2.14",
    "@types/react": "^19.1.8",
    "@types/react-dom": "^19.1.6",
    "astro": "^4.7.0",
    "class-variance-authority": "^0.7.1",
    "clsx": "^2.1.1",
    "lucide-react": "^0.515.0",
    "react": "^19.1.0",
    "react-dom": "^19.1.0",
    "tailwind-merge": "^3.3.1",
    "tailwindcss": "^3.4.1",
    "tailwindcss-animate": "^1.0.7",
    "typescript": "^5.4.5"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@shadcn/ui": "^0.0.4",
    "csv-parse": "^5.5.5",
    "shadcn": "^2.6.3"
  }
}

--- // Call to action component ---

Ready to Transform Your Lawn?

Get your free quote today and discover why homeowners throughout the Treasure Valley trust Lawns All Day

Call (208) 989-8378 Get Online Quote

Free estimates • Licensed & Insured • Satisfaction Guaranteed

--- ---

Professional Lawn Care in the Treasure Valley

Transform your outdoor space with expert lawn care and landscaping services. Serving Nampa, Meridian, Boise, and surrounding areas since 2015.

Get Free Quote View Services

500+ Happy Customers

10+

Years Experience

--- const locations = [ { name: 'Nampa', population: '100,000+', link: '/locations/nampa' }, { name: 'Meridian', population: '120,000+', link: '/locations/meridian' }, { name: 'Boise', population: '235,000+', link: '/locations/boise' }, { name: 'Eagle', population: '30,000+', link: '/locations/eagle' }, { name: 'Kuna', population: '24,000+', link: '/locations/kuna' }, { name: 'Caldwell', population: '60,000+', link: '/locations/caldwell' } ]; ---

Serving the Entire Treasure Valley

Professional lawn care services available throughout Idaho's premier communities

{locations.map((location) => (

{location.name}

Pop. {location.population}

))}

Don't see your area? We serve all of Canyon and Ada counties!

Contact Us

--- const services = [ { title: 'Lawn Mowing & Edging', description: 'Regular maintenance for a perfectly manicured lawn', icon: '🌱', link: '/services/lawn-mowing-and-edging' }, { title: 'Fertilization & Weed Control', description: 'Keep your lawn healthy and weed-free year-round', icon: '🌿', link: '/services/fertilization-and-weed-control' }, { title: 'Landscaping Design', description: 'Transform your outdoor space with professional design', icon: '🏡', link: '/services/landscaping' }, { title: 'Sprinkler Systems', description: 'Installation, repair, and maintenance services', icon: '💧', link: '/services/sprinkler-repair-and-maintenance' }, { title: 'Tree & Bush Trimming', description: 'Expert pruning for healthy, beautiful plants', icon: '🌳', link: '/services/tree-and-bush-trimming' }, { title: 'Overseeding & Repair', description: 'Restore bare spots and thicken your lawn', icon: '🌾', link: '/services/overseeding-and-lawn-repair' } ]; ---

Our Professional Services

Comprehensive lawn care and landscaping solutions tailored to your needs

{services.map((service) => (
{service.icon}

{service.title}

{service.description}

Learn More
))}

--- interface Props { title: string; children: any; } const { title, children } = Astro.props; --- {title}
Lawns All Day
Services About Contact
{children}

© {new Date().getFullYear()} Lawns All Day. All rights reserved.

/// <reference path="../.astro/types.d.ts" />
/// <reference types="astro/client" />

--- import SEO from '../components/SEO.astro'; import Header from '../components/Header.astro'; import Footer from '../components/Footer.astro'; export interface Props { title: string; description: string; keywords: string; schema: any; children: any; } const { title, description, keywords, schema, children } = Astro.props; --- {title}
Lawns All Day
Services About Contact
{children}

{new Date().getFullYear()} Lawns All Day. All rights reserved.

--- import BaseLayout from '../layouts/BaseLayout.astro'; import Hero from '../components/Hero.astro'; const pageTitle = "Contact Lawns All Day - Get Your Free Quote Today"; const pageDescription = "Contact Lawns All Day for professional lawn care services in Treasure Valley. Call (208) 989-8378 or email info@lawnsallday.com for a free quote."; ---

Get in Touch

Phone

(208) 989-8378

Mon-Sat: 7:00 AM - 7:00 PM

Email

Brad@lawnsallday.com

We respond within 24 hours

Service Area

Treasure Valley, Idaho

Including Boise, Meridian, Eagle, Nampa, and surrounding areas

Why Choose Lawns All Day?

  • Free estimates on all services
  • Licensed and insured professionals
  • 100% satisfaction guarantee
  • Same-week service available

Send Us a Message

Service Areas

We proudly serve the following areas:

Boise

City Center

Meridian

All Areas

Nampa

All Areas

Eagle

All Areas

Kuna

All Areas

Caldwell

All Areas

--- import SEO from '../../components/SEO.astro'; import Hero from '../../components/Hero.astro'; import Services from '../../components/Services.astro'; import CTA from '../../components/CTA.astro'; const schema = { '@context': 'https://schema.org', '@type': 'LocalBusiness', name: 'Lawn\'s All Day - Boise', address: { '@type': 'PostalAddress', addressRegion: 'ID', addressLocality: 'Boise' }, areaServed: { '@type': 'City', name: 'Boise', address: { '@type': 'PostalAddress', addressRegion: 'ID' } } }; ---

Why Choose Us for Your Boise Lawn Care?

Local Expertise

Serving Boise homeowners for years with personalized lawn care solutions

Complete Services

From mowing to fertilization to landscaping - we handle it all

Year-Round Care

Seasonal lawn care programs tailored to Boise's climate

--- import SEO from '../../components/SEO.astro'; import Hero from '../../components/Hero.astro'; import Services from '../../components/Services.astro'; import CTA from '../../components/CTA.astro'; import Locations from '../../components/Locations.astro'; const schema = { '@context': 'https://schema.org', '@type': 'Service', name: 'Fertilization & Weed Control', description: 'Professional lawn fertilization and weed control services in the Treasure Valley', provider: { '@type': 'LocalBusiness', name: 'Lawns All Day', address: { '@type': 'PostalAddress', addressRegion: 'ID', addressLocality: 'Nampa' } } }; ---

Our Fertilization & Weed Control Services

Custom Fertilization Programs

Tailored fertilizer applications based on soil type and seasonal needs

Organic Weed Control

Safe, effective weed control solutions that protect your family and pets

Seasonal Treatments

Timely applications to prevent weed growth and promote healthy grass

--- import SEO from '../../components/SEO.astro'; import Hero from '../../components/Hero.astro'; import Services from '../../components/Services.astro'; import CTA from '../../components/CTA.astro'; import Locations from '../../components/Locations.astro'; const schema = { '@context': 'https://schema.org', '@type': 'Service', name: 'Lawn Mowing & Edging', description: 'Professional lawn mowing and edging services in the Treasure Valley', provider: { '@type': 'LocalBusiness', name: 'Lawns All Day', address: { '@type': 'PostalAddress', addressRegion: 'ID', addressLocality: 'Nampa' } } }; ---

Our Lawn Mowing & Edging Services

Regular Maintenance

Weekly or bi-weekly mowing to maintain optimal grass height and health

Precision Edging

Clean, precise edging around flower beds, sidewalks, and driveways

Seasonal Adjustments

Adjustments to mowing frequency and height based on seasonal growth patterns
